Common Side Effects.Nausea: Feeling of queasiness, especially at the start of treatment.
Common Side Effects.Diarrhea: Frequent, loose stools, one of the most common gastrointestinal symptoms.
Common Side Effects.Abdominal Pain: Discomfort or cramping in the stomach area.
Common Side Effects.Fatigue: Generalized tiredness or lack of energy.

Hematologic Side Effects.Leukopenia: Reduced white blood cell count, increasing susceptibility to infections.
Hematologic Side Effects.Anemia: Low red blood cell count, causing fatigue and pallor.
Hematologic Side Effects.Thrombocytopenia: Low platelet count, increasing the risk of bruising or bleeding.
Hematologic Side Effects.Pancytopenia: Reduction in all blood cell types in severe cases.

Infections.Increased Risk of Infections: Due to immunosuppression, patients are prone to bacterial, viral, and fungal infections.
